tweets.tweet_content:
test I vibe coded Gumloop over the weekend!!
Presenting Agent Flow - an open-source alternative to Gumloop!

We built a free no-code AI Agent builder with @composiohq and @langchainai's Langgraph that lets you automate workflows and complex agentic patterns with drag-and-drop nodes.
